```{r}
library(tidyverse)

temp_fp <- "data/processed/snow_cover_hw.csv"

cover <- read_csv(temp_fp)
```


#### Get data type and number of NAs for each column
```{r}
for (col in names(cover)[6:9]){
  cat(names(cover[col]), "\n", 
         "\t", "type:", class(cover[col]), "\n", 
         "\t", "NAs", is.na(cover[col]) %>% sum(), "\n"
  )
}

```
